caption.p: HPLC chromatograms of analyzed cold-pressed oils. (A) Standard solution, (B) pistachio oil, (C) coriander seed oil, and (D) soybean oil, (E) green amaranth seed oil, (F) long skinny eggplant seed oil, (G) cauliflower seed oil, and (H) lettuce seed oil. Peak identification: 1 = cholecalciferol, 2 = stigmasterol + campesterol, 3 = β-sitosterol, and 4 = squalene.
